resources.description:
The Living Environment Deprivation Domain measures the quality of the local
environment. The indicators fall into two sub-domains. The ‘indoors’ living
environment measures the quality of housing; while the ‘outdoors’ living environment
contains measures of air quality and road traffic accidents. Source: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/english-indices-of-deprivation
resources.name: Living Environment Indicator for Herefordshire

resources.description: Data in JSON format (useful for developers)
resources.name: Living Environment Indicator for Herefordshire 2010 - 2013

organization.description:
This is the community datastore for Herefordshire. [Here is a post about what the datastore is and why you should care](http://h-map.org.uk/2016/05/06/what-is-the-herefordshire-datastore-and-why-should/).


Part of the [Brightspace Foundation Route Map project](http://h-map.org.uk/).

We blog over at the [Route Map blog](http://h-map.org.uk/category/all-posts/).

If you'd like to add data here, you'll need a datahub.io account. Then [contact the RouteMap project](http://h-map.org.uk/contact-us/).
organization.title: Herefordshire
organization.name: hdata

name: living-environment-indicator-for-herefordshire
notes:
The Living Environment Deprivation Domain measures the quality of the local

environment measures the quality of housing; while the ‘outdoors’ living environment contains measures of air quality and road traffic accidents.
title: Living Environment Deprivation Indicator for Herefordshire (quality of the local environment)
